sentences.en: A man used to vicissitudes is not easily dejected.
Also experienced many vicissitudes of life before the soul like the wind?
sentences.cn: 还要经历多少悲欢离合,才会灵魂像风?

sentences.en: He was battling against the vicissitudes of life.
sentences.cn: 他在每况愈下的生活中奋斗.

sentences.en: His life is marked by vicissitudes.
Human's love has division of the vicissitudes of life.
sentences.cn: 人的爱情有悲欢离合之分.

sentences.en: She showed deep sympathy for his vicissitudes of life.
sentences.cn: 她对他生命的变迁深表同情.

sentences.en: The city has been through many vicissitudes.
sentences.cn: 这个城市经历了多次兴衰.

sentences.en: The old man had experienced many vicissitudes of life.
The project was subject to the usual vicissitudes of exploratory research.
sentences.cn: 该项目受到探索性项目不确定性的支配.

sentences.en: The vicissitudes of insurance industry would influence widely and fatherly.
sentences.cn: 保险事业之荣枯,经营成败,波及广泛,影响深远.

sentences.en: These delicate qualities have survived his vicissitudes.
sentences.cn: 他虽然饱经不幸,但还是保存着这些出色的品质.

sentences.en: They passed through all the vicissitudes of the Polish nation.
sentences.cn: 他们和波兰共患难,历尽种种沧桑.

sentences.en: This picture is the life is light and the vicissitudes.
sentences.cn: 这就像是生活的平淡与沧桑.

sentences.en: Whatever the vicissitudes of her past life, Jill now seems to have come through.
sentences.cn: 不管过去经历了什么坎坷，吉尔现在似乎都已经挺过来了。

sentences.en: When you experienced vicissitudes, perhaps, will say you love me once.
sentences.cn: 也许我们真的不该融入彼此的生活.可是我爱你, 承担不起失去.

trans.tran_cn: 变迁，世事变化，变迁兴衰( vicissitude的名词复数 )，盛衰兴废
trans.tran_en: the continuous changes and problems that affect a situation or someone’s life
